entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
